attributes.action: We call upon HM Government not to allow retrospective re-vote of referendums.
attributes.additional_details: A re-vote on any election or referendum would give the majority of the voters a lack of confidence in the system, leading to a large number of   voters not turning up to vote in other elections.  If we are a democratic country we should stand by the majority votes and not be swayed in anyway.
attributes.background: The recent petition 'EU Referendum Rules triggering a 2nd EU Referendum' is claiming that because there was a turnout of less than 75% there should be a re-vote.
